meanings.sent1: After realizing the mistake, she reswallowed the pill.
meanings.sent2: He reswallowed his food to avoid choking.
meanings.sent3: The cat reswallowed the same mouse toy multiple times, thinking it was a new catch each time.
meanings.sent4: The river reswallowed the small boat as it drifted downstream.
meanings.sent5: The child reswallowed the candy to savor its sweetness a second time.
